statements: SELECT * FROM Vulnerabilities
SELECT vulnerability_name, patch_description FROM Vulnerabilities
SELECT * FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_id = 1
SELECT vulnerability_name, patch_id FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE patch_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name FROM Vulnerabilities ORDER BY vulnerability_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_id = 1;
SELECT vulnerability_name, patch_description FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_id = 2;
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name, patch_id FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_id > 3 AND patch_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vulnerability_id, patch_id, vulnerability_name FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE patch_description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM Vulnerabilities ORDER BY vulnerability_name DESC, vulnerability_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT name, description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT id, name, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'Critical';
SELECT patch_version, patch_date FROM patches ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, description, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE affected_systems ? 'Windows';
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT id, name, description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'Medium' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patches WHERE patch_date >= '2021-01-01' AND patch_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, patch_version FROM patches WHERE vulnerability_id = '826e4d23-3ea2-4692-931e-87f51db693ea';
SELECT vulnerability_id, COUNT(*) AS total_patches FROM patches GROUP BY vulnerability_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_patches DESC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities
SELECT name, description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High'
SELECT id, patch_version, patch_date FROM patches ORDER BY patch_date DESC
SELECT system_name, is_up_to_date FROM systems WHERE is_up_to_date = TRUE
SELECT vulnerabilities.name, patches.patch_version, systems.system_name FROM vulnerabilities JOIN patches ON vulnerabilities.id = patches.vulnerability_id JOIN systems ON systems.id = patches.id
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT name, description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE id = 1;

SELECT vulnerabilities.name, patches.patch_version, systems.system_name FROM vulnerabilities JOIN patches ON vulnerabilities.id = patches.vulnerability_id JOIN systems ON vulnerabilities.id = systems.id WHERE systems.is_up_to_date = true;

SELECT vulnerabilities.name AS vulnerability_name, patches.patch_version, patches.patch_date FROM vulnerabilities JOIN patches ON vulnerabilities.id = patches.vulnerability_id WHERE vulnerabilities.severity = 'Critical' ORDER BY patches.patch_date DESC;

SELECT vulnerabilities.name, count(patches.id) AS patch_count FROM vulnerabilities LEFT JOIN patches ON vulnerabilities.id = patches.vulnerability_id GROUP BY vulnerabilities.name HAVING patch_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT vulnerability_id, description, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT system_id, system_name, last_checked FROM systems ORDER BY last_checked DESC;
SELECT system_name, system_type FROM systems WHERE system_type = 'Server' ORDER BY system_name ASC;
SELECT system_name, patch_name, applied_timestamp FROM systems JOIN system_patches ON systems.system_id = system_patches.system_id JOIN patches ON system_patches.patch_id = patches.patch_id;
SELECT vulnerability_id, description, severity FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT patch_name, patch_description, timestamp FROM patches WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_name, system_type, last_checked FROM systems WHERE system_type = 'Linux' ORDER BY last_checked DESC;
SELECT system_name, patch_name, applied_timestamp FROM systems s JOIN system_patches sp ON s.system_id = sp.system_id JOIN patches p ON sp.patch_id = p.patch_id;

SELECT system_name AS system, COUNT(patch_id) AS total_patches FROM systems s JOIN system_patches sp ON s.system_id = sp.system_id GROUP BY system_name HAVING total_patches > 5 ORDER BY total_patches DESC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT name, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT * FROM patches ORDER BY date_published DESC;
SELECT description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE id = 3;
SELECT name, version FROM systems WHERE last_checked < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT name, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity='High';
SELECT description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE id=1;
SELECT v.name, p.version FROM vulnerabilities v JOIN patches p ON v.patch_id = p.id;
SELECT s.name, sv.vulnerability_id FROM systems s JOIN system_vulnerabilities sv ON s.id = sv.system_id;
